name: Alluvion Constellas
functionalText:
The first time Alluvion Constellas prevents arcane damage each turn, if it has less than 4 energy counters, you may put an energy counter on it.

**Instant** - Remove 2 energy counters from Alluvion Constellas: The next staff ability you activate this turn costs {r}{r}{r} less.

**Arcane Barrier 1**

name: Spellfire Cloak
functionalText:
**Instant** - Destroy Spellfire Cloak: Gain {r}. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn.

**Arcane Barrier 1**

name: Tome of Duplicity
functionalText: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, then banish one. If it's a 'non-attack' action card, you may play it this turn as though it were an instant.

name: Rewind
functionalText: **Negate** target 'non-attack' action card and return it to its owner's hand. Then that hero gains 1 action point.

name: Dampen
functionalText:
Deal 4 arcane damage to any target.

Prevent the next X arcane damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn, where X is the damage dealt by Dampen.

name: Dampen
functionalText:
Deal 3 arcane damage to any target.

Prevent the next X arcane damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn, where X is the damage dealt by Dampen.

name: Dampen
functionalText:
Deal 2 arcane damage to any target.

Prevent the next X arcane damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn, where X is the damage dealt by Dampen.

name: Aether Dart
functionalText: Deal 3 arcane damage to any target.

name: Aether Dart
functionalText: Deal 2 arcane damage to any target.

name: Aether Dart
functionalText: Deal 1 arcane damage to any target.

name: Read the Ripples
functionalText: At the beginning of your end phase, destroy Read the Ripples then **opt 1**, **opt 1**, **opt 1**, and draw a card.

name: Read the Ripples
functionalText: At the beginning of your end phase, destroy Read the Ripples then **opt 1**, **opt 1**, and draw a card.

name: Singe
functionalText: Deal 1 arcane damage to target hero and up to 3 target allies they control.

name: Singe
functionalText: Deal 1 arcane damage to target hero and up to 2 target allies they control.

name: Singe
functionalText: Deal 1 arcane damage to target hero and up to 1 target ally they control.

name: Crown of Providence
functionalText:
When you defend with Crown of Providence, you may put a card from your hand or arsenal on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card.

**Blade Break**

name: Helio's Mitre
functionalText:
*(A player may add a Helio's Mitre to their card pool in an Uprising limited format.)*

**Instant** - {r}{r}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn by a source of your choice. Destroy Helio's Mitre at the beginning of the end phase.

name: Quelling Robe
functionalText: **Quell 1**

name: Erase Face
functionalText: When this hits a hero, cards they own lose all class and talent types until the end of their next turn.

name: Vipox
functionalText: When Vipox hits a hero, they lose {h} equal to the number of cards in their hand.

name: That All You Got?
functionalText: While this is defending an attack with 2 or less {p}, when the combat chain closes, draw a card.

name: Fog Down
functionalText:
'Non-attack' action cards lose and can't gain **go again**.

At the beginning of your action phase, destroy Fog Down.

name: Flex
functionalText: When you attack or defend with Flex, you may pay {r}{r}. If you do, it gains +2{p}.
